      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Represents a database server.

      Represents a domain controller server.
      class  FileServer
      Represents a file server.
      class  Layer2Switch
      Represents a layer 2 switch which maintains a list of MAC addresses of hosts connected to it(including devices connected to the WAP(indirect)).
      class  MobileDevice 
      class  NetworkPrinter
      Represents a network printer though there are no details available for network printers in the database.

      Represents a PC.
      class  Server
      Represents a general server.

    • Uses of Host in networkmodel

      Methods in networkmodel with parameters of type Host 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String NetworkModel.singleHostMACIP(Host host)
      Returns the mac and ip address of a single host.(This satisfies use-case 2)
      static java.lang.String NetworkModel.singleHostProbe(Host host)
      Returns a host's name and IP address.
      Method parameters in networkmodel with type arguments of type Host 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void NetworkModel.multiHostProbe(java.util.ArrayList<Host> hostArray)
      Returns the name and ip address of all online hosts having been passed an array of all hosts (This satisfies use-case 7)
